translations: [法]条款（clause 的复数形式）；[计]子句

sentences.sentence: Sentences can be broken up into clauses.
A compound sentence contains two or more clauses.
sentences.translation: 复合句包含两个或多个从句。

sentences.sentence: These clauses form part of the contract between buyer and seller.
sentences.translation: 这些条款构成买卖双方所签合同的一部分。
